title: Cannot unlock Aatrox

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
Every time I try to unlock Aatrox, this message pop up... It has been 4 days now.

Can someone help me?

replies.body: Try waiting until the shard disappears from your inventory before pressing anything else (it'll take a few seconds). I've found that if you press anything else too quick when trying to redeem a permanent shard it breaks and gives this message.

OMG THANK YOU SO MUCH I HAD THE SAME PROBLEM ANDD IT WORKED!!!
ILYSM{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I've had it about 4-5 times over the last few days so it's one I'm familiar with :P Glad you got it fixed, hope OP did too.
